titleStmt.title: News from New-England: in a letter written to a person of quality, wherein is a true account of the present state of that countrey, with respect to the late revolution, and the present war with the Indians there. : Together with a relation of a late and bloody fight between the English and the Indians, wherein the latter were routed : As also of a pretended miracle of the French Jesuits in that part of the world : Licens'd Febr. 27. 1689. J.F.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Dunton, at the Raven in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
